LanguageData.Turret_CGear_Grenade.label: TC Grenade Mortar
LanguageData.Turret_CGear_Grenade.description: Based on the TC mortar but firing multiple grenades.
LanguageData.Artillery_Grenade_CGear.label: TC Grenade Mortar
LanguageData.Artillery_Grenade_CGear.description: Grenade Mortar. Lobs grenades over walls. Inaccurate but long-ranged.
